Description: No Broker Fee Modern 4 bed, 2 bath unit in the Jeffries Point area of East Boston. Located close to East Boston Memorial Park, Bremen Street Dog Park, public transportation, various stores and restaurants. Unit features in unit washer and dryer, brand new stainless steel appliances, central air/heating. Easy resident street parking. Dogs are considered on a case by case basis for an additional $200 per month. Cats are OK for an additional $150 per month. Security deposit negotiable. TENANTS WILL BE RESPONSIBLE FOR WATER AND SEWER PAYMENTS.
